body_html:
So this works. I'm sorry I wasn't clear before, it is good to use tf_inspect instead of inspect, so it can use TFDecorator decorated functions as model_fn.

To do that, use tf_inspect. getargspec, and ideally make that function compatible with py3 by adding the switch for getfullargspec as you did inline.

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/util/tf_inspect.py#L32

So this works. I'm sorry I wasn't clear before, it is good to use tf_inspect instead of inspect, so it can use TFDecorator decorated functions as model_fn.
To do that, use tf_inspect. getargspec, and ideally make that function compatible with py3 by adding the switch for getfullargspec as you did inline.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/util/tf_inspect.py#L32
body:
So this works. I'm sorry I wasn't clear before, it is good to use tf_inspect instead of inspect, so it can use TFDecorator decorated functions as model_fn. 

To do that, use tf_inspect. getargspec, and ideally make that function compatible with py3 by adding the switch for getfullargspec as you did inline.

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/util/tf_inspect.py#L32
